description: Running tracker of public statements by large software companies quantifying AI's impact

statements.statement: Agentforce deployed to 1,000+ enterprise customers; AI-attributed revenue growing 'faster than any product in company history'
AI-generated content now covers 80%+ of new course material; reduced content creation costs significantly while expanding language offerings
AIP platform drove commercial revenue growth of 54% YoY; US commercial revenue up 64%
AI adoption tied to workflows scaling faster than standalone copilots; guided to high end of 20% subscription revenue growth for 2026, 32% non-GAAP operating margin, 36% FCF margin
FY2026 revenue guidance $7.18-7.20B vs $6.22B consensus — 61% projected revenue surge driven by AIP platform; Q1 guidance $1.53-1.54B vs $1.45B consensus

statements.source: Pre-Q4 FY26 analyst notes / Yahoo Finance
statements.statement: Agentforce token consumption rising; Wall Street bullish ahead of FQ4 2026 earnings. Prior quarter: $900M data cloud + AI ARR (up 120% YoY), 5,000+ Agentforce deals, RPO jumped 11% to $63.4B

statements.metric: 137% US commercial revenue growth, $7.2B 2026 revenue guide (+61% YoY)
$15.5B 2026 subscription revenue target (from $12.9B in 2025), CEO targets $1T valuation
Deepened AI platform strategy with Anthropic partnership
Pioneering 'Agentic Enterprise License Agreement' (AELA) — fixed-price all-you-can-eat Agentforce
